[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Andrew_Tullo_Clinical_Recruiter.jpg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Andrew Headshot” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_duration=”500ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” hover_enabled=”0″ use_border_color=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on”]

 

[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” hover_enabled=”0″ z_index_tablet=”500″ use_border_color=”off”]

Andrew Tullo, Account Manager Clinical

Andrew joined the ClinLab Staffing Clinical team in September 2018. He previously worked at a pharmaceutical company, giving him great experience within the industry. Andrew came from Union College in upstate New York, where he enjoyed his time with his close friends. He worked diligently in his first year as a recruiter, and was rewarded in 2019 with the Top Recruiter Billing number of over 300k GM. He says a lot of his success stems from the great leadership of the Clinical Group leader, Carly Sullivan. In the past year, he has been promoted to Account Manager for the Clinical staffing team, and he is now connecting with both candidates and new clients across the United States.

Andrew’s hobbies are purely seasonal. In the winters he spends his time on the ice or at the ski resort, carving it up with some of the other ClinLab employees. In the warm weather he takes to the golf course where he lives by the “drive for show, putt for dough” slogan. He has been living in Boston since late 2018, and even though he is an avid New York Islanders fan, he enjoys heading to the Bruins’ games with the other ClinLab faithful. When asked if he could name something that contributed to his overall success he said, “two words: Carly Sullivan.”

Massachusetts Offices

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
